gwt.g3d.client.mesh
Class StaticMesh

java.lang.Object
  gwt.g3d.client.mesh.AbstractMesh
      gwt.g3d.client.mesh.StaticMesh
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLDisposable, Mesh
public class StaticMesh
extends AbstractMesh

Represents a mesh whose vertices' information will stay the same once created. A StaticMesh is very similar to SimpleStaticMesh excepts this uses indices for rendering.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

StaticMesh

StaticMesh

public StaticMesh(GL2 gl,
                  TypeArray positions,
                  TypeArray normals,
                  TypeArray texCoords,
                  TypeArray indices)
Initializes the mesh with the given data. This will also AbstractMesh.init(GL2), so there is no need to call AbstractMesh.init(GL2) again.

Parameters:

positions -
normals -
texCoords -
indices -

getDrawElementType

public DrawElementsType getDrawElementType()
Gets the draw element type.

setDrawElementType

public void setDrawElementType(DrawElementsType elementType)
Sets the draw element type. The default draw element type is UNSIGNED_SHORT.

setPositionIndex

public void setPositionIndex(int positionIndex)
Sets the index of the vertex position attribute. If the attribute index is negative, the buffer will not be binded to gl.

Parameters:
positionIndex -

setPositionData

public void setPositionData(TypeArray positions)
Sets the position data. This is equivalent to calling setPositionData(positions, DataType.FLOAT, 3).

Parameters:
positions -

public void setPositionData(TypeArray positions,
                            DataType dataType,
                            int size)
Sets the position data.

Parameters:
positions -
dataType - type of the data passed.
size - number of elements per vertex.

setNormalIndex

public void setNormalIndex(int normalIndex)
Sets the index of the vertex normal attribute. If the attribute index is negative, the buffer will not be binded to gl.

Parameters:
normalIndex -

setNormalData

public void setNormalData(TypeArray normals)
Sets the normals data. This is equivalent to calling setNormalData(normals, DataType.FLOAT, 3, false).

Parameters:
normals -

setNormalData

public void setNormalData(TypeArray normals,
                          DataType dataType,
                          int size,
                          boolean normalize)
Sets the normals data.

Parameters:
normals -
dataType - type of the data passed.
size - number of elements per vertex.
normalize - whether to normalize the indices

setTexCoordIndex

public void setTexCoordIndex(int texCoordIndex)
Sets the index of the vertex texture coordinate attribute. If the attribute index is negative, the buffer will not be binded to gl.

Parameters:
